content: To veterans of the Joe Barry Carroll/Purvis Short/World B. Free/Todd Fuller/Vonteego Cummings eras, this whole “superteam” thing still feels unreal. But in light of the microscope that the Dubs have been under this season, the headlines have been remarkably uneventful. When the biggest stories are Iggy’s cryptic quotes and Steph’s pick for MVP, that’s the sign of a boring team (off the court edition).
